main event: On June 6, 1953, two witnesses observed a bright white sphere about 30-40 feet in diameter for approximately 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object approached silently from the northeast,The object descended to an estimated height of 500-700 feet,It accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view to the southeast,The sighting lasted around 15 seconds,The report includes 2 photographs showing a tree silhouette and a submerged structure.
